text.p: These are the leading stories in Zimbabwe's state-owned Herald newspaper on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Zimbabwean president Robert Mugabe on Tuesday urged more investors to come into the Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) region, assuring them of continued efforts to achieve total regional peace essential for economic and social development.

- The long awaited Z$250 million cellular telephone network services contract between Zimbabwe's Post and Telecommunications Corporation (PTC) and Siemens International of Germany was signed on Tuesday.
